replies.message: Thanks for your feedback Dewin! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1teI404  -Elissa

Would that include where to suggest a rigid airship instead of a standard fixed wing drone for the WiFi project? ^_^

Just thinking a stationary hub might result in fewer people having routing issues as their dns paths keep changing and dynamic DNS isn't always 100% effective?
